Name: Buttery Flyfish Lv.3
Description: Recommend: Stormblade, Wind Knight, Heavy Guardian, Marksman, and Shield Knight.
Description$english: Recommend: Stormblade, Wind Knight, Heavy Guardian, Marksman, and Shield Knight.
Description2$english: A large amount of butter is spread on pre-treated fish with knife patterns and then baked. The unique and exquisite knife work makes the finished grilled fish appear as if it is flying, hence the name "Butter Flying Fish"â€”though the phrasing is not quite right.
